name: Coffee Liqueur (Kahlua)
description: This recipes gives you DIY coffee liqueur fast and easy- no waiting for anything to steep or soak. It also uses REAL coffee. You can make Coffee Liqueur with any spirit you choose- Vodka, Rum and Bourbon are all in my line-up. But keep in mind that the spirit will affect the flavor of the coffee liqueur.

ingredients.ingredient: cups  White Rum, Vodka, or Bourbon

directions: Add sugar and coffee to heavy bottom pot.
Take syrup off heat as soon as it boils.
Add Syrup, alcohol of choice, and vanilla extract to storage container and shake to mix.
